roleset.name: curve the back

example.name: the one example
example.text: Their factories may look like sets for a Spielberg movie, but their offices, with rows of clerks hunched over ledgers and abacuses, are more like scenes from a Dickens novel.

roleset.note: Treebank puts a specious trace in object position. Dunno why.
